actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution relative to the action of the Canadian Government regarding participation in the Olympics.

summary.text: Disapproves of the action of those responsible within the Canadian Government for their behavior in excluding the Republic of China from the XXI Summer Olympics. Condems the International Olympic Committee for its role in such action. Urges the International Olympic Committee, in the future, to seek the commitment of a second accredited nation to the preparation of an alternative Olympic Site.

titles.title: A resolution relative to the action of the Canadian Government regarding participation in the Olympics.
